Public Remarks: This beautifully updated condo is located in one of Scottsdale's most desirable areas, Old Town. Just steps away from a vibrant mix of shops, dining, and entertainment, this property offers the ultimate in convenience and location.  The condo features modern updates throughout, including a stylish, fully-equipped kitchen and a stackable washer and dryer for added convenience. Whether you're enjoying the lively atmosphere of Old Town or relaxing in your updated, private retreat, this home offers it all.  Community amenities include a refreshing pool, perfect for hot Arizona days. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this prime location and enjoy all that Old Town Scottsdale has to offer!
Directions: The north west corner of 78th street and Indian School

Public Remarks: Beautifully updated industrial modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo located in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale.     Situated one block from Fashion Square Mall, fine dining, and the vibrant Scottsdale Waterfront, this move-in-ready condo offers an unparalleled lifestyle.    The open floor plan features tile flooring throughout and a kitchen island, perfect for entertaining.    Monthly HOA fees cover electricity, water, sewer, trash, and air conditioning/heating    Don't miss this opportunity to own a stylish and conveniently located condo in one of Scottsdale's most desirable neighborhoods. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, vacation home, or investment property, this unit is a must-see.
Directions: From Camelback road go North on 68th street and go east on Highland to unit 214 - complex is on the East side of 68th

Public Remarks: This highly upgraded unit at Camelback House comes with RARE In-Unit Laundry! Short Term Rentals are approved by the HOA. New windows and patio slider door and an additional mini-split AC unit, serving the primary bedroom. Stunning polished porcelain tile flooring through the main level lead to the custom wooden stairway and new carpet upstairs. The functional kitchen boasts newer stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and gorgeous mosaic tile backsplash. The primary bathroom features a rainfall shower-head and sleek glass tile surround. Available fully furnished including the Copenhagen couch and other high end pieces. The location is unbeatable... walk across 68th St to the Fashion Square Mall, LifeTime Fitness and an abundance of world class shopping, dining and entertainment.
Directions: North on 68th St... park on 68th St at Northern end of the community and walk south to south end of building 301-315. Unit is 2nd in from the street.

Public Remarks: Welcome to your exclusive retreat nestled in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale. This exquisite 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom residence embodies the perfect fusion of luxury and seclusion within the confines of a secure, gated community. Step through the entrance and be greeted by elegant luxury vinyl plank flooring that spans throughout the space, and immediate access to your  backyard. The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, Shaker white cabinetry, pristine quartz countertops, and a convenient breakfast bar designed for seamless entertaining. The primary bedroom is a sanctuary of its own on the first floor! Primary bathroom offers a dual vanity and tiled walk in shower.  The backyard is low maintence featuring pavers and matured lush green trees with purple flowers, creating the ideal
Directions: West on Camelback to 66th Street, North on 66th to guard on east side of the street. Drive to gate and cross first street, take second left, unit will be on your left side to 2 car carport

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautifully upgraded 2 bed, 2 bath ground-floor unit with 1,066 sq ft at Maya Condominiums in Scottsdale?just minutes from Old Town, shopping, dining, parks, and the 101. One of only six units with a grandfathered-in laundry hookup, this home features an open floor plan, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, custom backsplash, and two spacious master suites. Enjoy upgraded lighting, crown molding, diamond-pattern tile floors, and a private poolside patio with a fireplace. The community offers a heated pool, spa, fitness rooms, and billiard room?and best of all, there are no restrictions on nightly rentals, making this property short-term rental ready for savvy investors. Furniture available on a separate bill of sale.
Directions: After passing N 82nd Street, look for 7625 E Camelback Road on the right. Enter the complex and locate Unit 138B, which is situated in Building B.

Public Remarks: Beautiful 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Condo in Casa Requena, Scottsdale.    Welcome to Casa Requena, a highly sought-after gated community in the heart of Scottsdale! This turn-key condo offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.    Property Features:    2 Bedrooms, 2 Baths: Spacious and well-appointed. Adorable n/s facing unit. Views of Camelback Mtn from Balcony. Walk in master shower.  Stackable washer and dryer.     Prime Location: Close to Old Town Scottsdale, baseball stadium, theatre, shopping, restaurants, and hospital. Views of Camelback Mtn from Balcony.    Community Amenities: Enjoy the community pool, elevator access, secure gated entry, and covered parking.    Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to live in one of Scottsdale's most popular communities.
Directions: Approximately 2 blocks south of Osborn, East of Civic Center on Earll Drive.

Public Remarks: Four blocks from Old Town Scottsdale, this beautifully updated two-bedroom, two-bathroom condo offers a perfect blend of modern comfort & architectural character. Just moments from dining, shopping, nightlife & top Arizona golf courses, this property is ideal as a personal retreat or a turn-key short-term rental. Renovated by an architect, the condo features mid-century design elements & floor-to-ceiling sliding doors. Stainless steel appliances, a gas stove & an additional wall oven are perfect for entertaining. Additional highlights include in-unit laundry & a new HVAC system. This single-level, step-free condo also includes two covered parking spaces.  Experience the best of Scottsdale, whether you're looking for a stylish home or a performing investment property, this is a must-see!

Public Remarks: Welcome to Casa del Monte! This amazing 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom single-level condo offers 1,575 sq. ft. of comfortable living in one of the best locations in Scottsdale. Just minutes from Scottsdale Fashion Square, renowned restaurants, art galleries, and the charm of Old Town Scottsdale, you'll be at the center of it all. Love the outdoors? Camelback Mountain hiking is right up the street?and you can even enjoy daily mountain views from your own backyard!  Located in a 24-hour guard-gated community, Casa del Monte offers resort-style amenities including multiple pools, spa, tennis courts, shuffleboard, clubhouse, fitness center, and BBQ areas. Amazing location on the cusp of the coveted Arcadia neighborhood and 15-20 minutes from sky harbor.
Directions: North on 66th St. 1st Right into Casa Del Monte - security guard at gate. Please provide business card and photo id, if not on business card. Unit One first home on right.

Public Remarks: 5-STAR LIVING at ''THE MARK'' on the elegant 5th Floor in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale. Luxurious 2 bed, 2 bath home with stunning views of Papago Mtn. & city lights!  STUNNING Remodeled kitchen w/diagonal cut tiled backsplash and gorgeous white quartz countertops. Wolf gas range/oven w/hood, Stainless Kitchen-Aid appliances, NEW sink, faucet & breakfast bar! Master retreat w/large walk-in closet. Full concierge service, NEW POOL/SPA, BBQ/KITCHEN on same floor. NEW remodeled FITNESS ROOM, conference room & expresso bar on Main floor. The HOA fee covers A/C & gas costs, Internet and 1 underground parking space w/NEW EV charger & storage! A true secure lock and leave. Get treated like royalty w/top notch service! Also order room service from Valley Ho HOTEL.   *See AMENITIES IN DOCS TAB
Directions: South on 69th St from Indian School Rd. West on Main St from 69th St. End of Main St on the south side, Adjacent to Valley Ho Hotel. Park in Visitors Parking & Obtain a parking pass from Concierge.

Public Remarks: Also available for lease at $3,300/mo. Fully remodeled and perfectly located, this turnkey townhome offers modern living just steps from Old Town Scottsdale. This stunning home features brand-new electrical, plumbing, vinyl plank flooring, white oak cabinetry, and quartz countertops, with a waterfall island and stainless appliances anchoring the open kitchen. Natural light pours in through new windows dual-pane windows and a 12' sliding glass door, leading to a private backyard with a new pergola. New water heater installed, HVAC replaced in 2020. HOA allows short-term rentals for optional income potential. Stylish, walkable, and ready for you with everything Scottsdale has to offer!
Directions: Head north on N Miller Rd, to driveway D, right to the end, left to property

Legal Description (Abbrev): OPTIMA CAMELVIEW VILLAGE CONDOMINIUM 2ND AMD MCR 803-35 UNIT 4005 BLDG 1 7117 E RANCHO VISTA DR (PLE
Public Remarks: This FULLY FURNISHED, move-in-ready 4th-floor corner unit is bathed in natural light, offering a bright and airy ambiance with incredible views of Camelback. Updates throughout enhance its modern appeal, while two separate patios provide the perfect spaces to relax and take in the scenery. Whether you're an investor seeking a long-term rental opportunity (90-day min) or searching for a personal oasis, this condo appeals to a broad range of buyers. It features 2 spacious bedrooms with new wood-look flooring and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern gourmet kitchen boasts marble waterfall countertops and stainless steel appliances. Conveniently located near shopping, dining, & nightlife, this unit also benefits from Camelview's exceptional amenities: pools, gym & the concierge.
Directions: From Scottsdale Rd, turn west onto Rancho Vista. At T intersection turn left. The road will take you down to the lower level of parking under Camelview condos. Park on perimeter in Guest Parking.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 1012 BLOCK 1 OPTIMA CAMELVIEW VILLAGE CONDOMINIUM AMD MCR 075311
Public Remarks: Rare &  unique and private first-floor unit with no shared walls and a private entrance, tucked away from the main path.   Enjoy a secluded fenced-in yard and patio surrounded by lush greenery?ideal for pets, entertaining, or relaxing mornings. Floor-to-ceiling windows on three sides flood the space with light. Features include wide-plank hickory-look tile, granite counters, dual A/C, remote blinds, and full-size washer/dryer. Split floor plan with spacious primary suite, travertine shower, double sinks, and walk-in closet. Includes 1 gated garage spot. Optima Camelview offers  24,000 sq ft health club ,pools, dog park, indoor courts, putting green, concierge, security and more? prime walkable Scottsdale location near Fashion Square and Old Town.    This gem will go fast!
Directions: Scottsdale Rd. N. to Rancho Vista Dr, turn left. Left into entry then Left into E. garage. Drive to end & turn right.

Agency Name: Grigg's Group Powered by The Altman Brothers (ggpb001)
Public Remarks: **FINANCING AVAILABLE - ASK FOR DETAILS!** Ground floor 2 bed, 2 bath condo in the heart of old-town Scottsdale!  Warm, neutral tones throughout the home along with wood flooring for easy care and maintenance.  Great place for those wanting to add to their investment portfolio or to be near the Scottsdale lifestyle.  Open floor plan.  Formal dining area between the great room and kitchen area.  Eat-up bar seating, pantry and all appliances included in the kitchen.  Large bedrooms and beautiful bathrooms with glass-enclosed showers. Private open patio area dual sliding doors that open up to enjoy the outdoors.  Community has a heated pool and spa, BBQ area, putting green, and assigned parking.  Just a short distance walk to Camelback Fashion Square with plenty of shops and dining.
Directions: EAST ON CAMELBACK TO PARKWAY, SOUTH ON PARKWAY TO 2ND ENTRANCE ON WEST SIDE. UNIT 148B IS IN THE SOUTHWEST SIDE OF THE BUILDING OVERLOOKING MONTECITO AVE.

Public Remarks: Spectacular opportunity to own a charming 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Condo in the Heart of Old Town Scottsdale! This lovely unit features an open layout, plenty of natural light, split floor plan, spacious primary bedroom, and a patio off the living area to enjoy the Arizona sunshine. Located in the vibrant Winfield Place community, you'll enjoy access to two heated pools, a community center, and plenty of green space. This prime Old Town location is just steps away from the canal paths, Greenbelt biking/walking trail, world-class shopping, and top-notch restaurants. Surrounded by hiking, golf courses, spring training facilities, and endless Scottsdale entertainment options. Easy access to the 101 freeway, downtown PHX, and ASU. Don't miss out on this unrivaled location and lifestyle!
Directions: East of Chaparral from Scottsdale Road; Left at 2nd Community entrance on North side of road

Public Remarks: Mid-Century Charm in the Heart of Old Town  Sold fully furnished?kitchenware, linens, and dcor included?this turnkey 1958 condo was remodeled in 2002 by architect Jay Villa, blending Mid-Century style with modern ease. The open layout features smooth walls, a spacious great room, and a cook's kitchen with stainless appliances and ample storage. Two en-suite bedrooms offer flexibility for dual primaries or a guest/office setup. Enjoy views of the community pool and Camelback Mountain. Steps from Hotel Valley Ho and close to Old Town Scottsdale's restaurants, bars, shops, and vibrant scene. A turnkey property that also makes a great rental investment?set in an area that continues to grow and evolve. Don't miss out on your opportunity to live where all the fun happens!
Directions: South on Goldwater from Indian School Rd, turn west (right) on 70th St, west (right) on 4th St to property on the North side of the street.

Public Remarks: Here is a wonderful opportunity to buy a 3-Bed/3-Bath home in Villa Monterey for well under $600,000: Two Main Bedrooms with En suite baths, large open living room, tile in main areas, formal dining, adorable back yard with mature citrus, shaded patio, beautiful community ramada, pool and spa, and planned events throughout the year! Nearby: Biking & walking paths, parks, Chaparral Lake, Old Town Scottsdale, art galleries, top-notch restaurants, and Fashion Square.Villa Monterey is a sought-after 55+ historic community in central Scottsdale, renowned for its walkability, peaceful ambiance, and strong sense of neighborly connection. Featuring charming, low-maintenance townhomes with diverse architectural styles, the community access to amenities such as a clubhouse, pool, and spa.

Legal Description (Abbrev): SCOTTSDALE HOUSE PLAT 2 AMD 127-24 BLDG 36 APT UNIT A-4 & .2632 PERCENT OF LAND AND COM ELEMENTS
Public Remarks: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this beautifully maintained 1-bedroom, 1-bath condo in the highly sought-after Scottsdale House. Nestled in a gated, resort-style community spanning over 40 acres of lush, mature landscaping, this home offers a serene retreat just steps from the energy of Fashion Square Mall. Natural light pours into the living space, highlighting the open and inviting layout. Glass doors from both the living room and bedroom lead to a private patio, creating a seamless indoor-outdoor flow. The spacious bathroom features an updated vanity with plenty of storage, while the in-unit washer and dryer add everyday convenience. This residence has been immaculately cared for and includes a separate storage unit and covered parking!
Directions: From Camelback Rd, North on N 68th St to Scottsdale House - Gate entrance, Once inside, Turn left and then turn immediate right. Unit 263 will be on the left across from community center

Whether you're curling up by the cozy fireplace, lounging on the serene front patio, or enjoying the private backyard oasis, you'll love how this home balances space and functionality. Plus, the sparkling community pool adds a touch of resort-style living to this exceptional property.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this immaculate & furnished 3 bed, 2.5 bath townhome, beautifully updated with high-end finishes and designer touches throughout. The open-concept layout features a chef's kitchen equipped with premium stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry, large island and granite countertops. A functional kitchen and living space that is perfect for entertaining or everyday living. The double wide slider door off the kitchen opens to the covered patio nicely finished with a built-in gas BBQ grill. Located just steps from the vibrant shops, dining, and nightlife of Old Town Scottsdale, this property offers unbeatable convenience and lifestyle. No short-term rental restrictions make this a rare investment opportunity or ideal primary residence. Move-in ready and truly one of a kind!

Public Remarks: SOLD AS FEE SIMPLE-You can't beat this location!! Remodeled in 2015, this Darling 3 bedroom (w/ walk-in closets), 2 bath & 2 car garage home is the perfect for downsizing or use as a 2nd home.  Upon entering the home, you will love the natural light & the vaulted ceilings. Huge great room w/ fireplace & space for formal dining w/ French doors to the back yard.  The kitchen features SS appliances, tons of storage & counter space & its own private exit to another  patio. The primary suite is HUGE w/ a sitting area &  doors to the outside. Low maintenance yard w/ space for BBQ gatherings & seating. Walk throughout neighborhood  or hop on your bike to Old Town Scottsdale, Hilton Village, Scottsdale Fashion Square,AJ's or Trader Joes.
Directions: From Scottsdale Road, go east on Palo Verde. South on 73rd then right on Solano Dr.

Public Remarks: Location, style, and value?this second-floor condo has it all. Perfectly situated just minutes from Old Town Scottsdale, Scottsdale Fashion Square, and some of the best dining, shopping, and entertainment the city has to offer, this home puts you in the center of it all. Inside, you'll love the fully remodeled kitchen and bathrooms with tasteful finishes throughout. This unit truly stands out from the rest in the community with its upgraded interior, quiet location, and incredible move-in-ready condition. Most of the furniture is available on a separate bill of sale for added convenience. Enjoy a peaceful community pool, shared laundry, and a low-maintenance lifestyle with an HOA that covers water, heating, cooling, and electricity. Plus, FHA financing is available!

Public Remarks: Nestled within the Resort Corridor of Scottsdale, this beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence offers both luxury and convenience. Designed by renowned architect Bennie Gonzalez, the home blends timeless charm with modern upgrades. The spacious bedrooms all feature ensuite baths and walkin closets, with one primary bedroom conveniently located on the first floor. The thoughtfully updated home boasts new appliances and HVAC, while a new roof ensures peace of mind. Step outside to enjoy two outdoor living spaces, the back complete with a small pool and refinished deck, perfect for relaxation or entertaining. Located within walking distance to fine dining and shopping, this gated community offers a home with an unbeatable combination of style, comfort, and prime location.
Directions: East on McDonald from Scottsdale. Enter Las Villas gate from McDonald. Home is first on the left. Extra parking is available in front of home.

Public Remarks: Welcome to Seville Place, a charming mid-century community nestled in the heart of Scottsdale. This ground-level 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo offers 999 square feet of potential, perfect for those seeking to infuse their personal touch or embrace its retro allure. Built in 1963, the unit retains its original character, providing a blank canvas for modernization or vintage appreciation. Enjoy the convenience of no stairs and direct access to the community pool, ideal for relaxation and entertaining. Located just moments from Old Town Scottsdale, residents have easy access to renowned dining, shopping, and cultural attractions.
Directions: North on SCOTTSDALE Rd, east on on RANCHO VISTA, North on ON 73rd Street,, East on Northland.

The main living spaces are elegantly adorned with Travertine flooring. This highly sought-after floor plan allows both bedrooms to have separate access to a 40-foot covered balcony. Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 5002 BLOCK 7 OPTIMA CAMELVIEW VILLAGE CONDOMINIUM AMD MCR 075311
Public Remarks: WOW. Welcome home to the most exceptionally designed residence at Optima Camelview Village. Unit 5002 is 2 Bed + office premium skybridge unit with three sides of glass and panoramic views. Completely remodeled with high end finishes including Thermador appliances, custom millwork and stunning white oak floors throughout. Must see to appreciate the detail and craft of this unit. No expense spared! Among dramatic waterfalls, reflective pools and lush landscaping, the Camelview Village amenities include three swimming pools(indoor & outdoor), outdoor putting green, racquetball, basketball/pickleball court, fitness center with separate workout studios, plus a spa, sauna facilities and locker rooms, party room and concierge services. HOA includes water, sewer, trash, gas and cable.
Directions: West on Rancho Vista. Enter parking garage on left from Rancho Vista, guest parking is on the Right/West parking garage.

Public Remarks: Just steps away from the vibrant heart of Old Town Scottsdale, this charming 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom second-floor unit is in excellent condition and move-in ready! Its cozy, bungalow-style layout is perfect for both residents and investors alike. With a minimum 5-day rental policy, this unit offers a fantastic opportunity for passive income. The spacious floor plan includes a generous living area, kitchen, and bedroom, all complemented by a large closet. The community features convenient amenities such as a storage unit, dedicated parking with double parking as an option, and a well-maintained pool and common areas. Whether you're looking for a new home or a smart investment, this property is packed with potential!
Directions: It is easiest to park on 2nd street and walk through the main entry gate!

Public Remarks: A rare find in Old Town Scottsdale. Nearly 2000sf of beautiful luxury with two master bedrooms plus a 3rd bedroom/den with a Murphy Bed. Masters have beautiful bamboo flooring. Updated professionally by Designer  with top of the line appliances.  This secure building with a full time concierge, maintenance personnel, and gated parking with EV charging stations. A true lock & leave. Starbucks, CVS, Sprouts 1/2 block away, Whole Foods coming across street.  Enjoy the heated pool and spa, fitness facilities, game and billiard rooms and libraries.  All of this in the heart of Scottsdale's world-class entertainment and shopping districts plus SF Giant spring training.  Convenient biking and hiking trails near-by. 2 covered parking space for your exclusive use.
Directions: North on Miller from Indian School. Five story building on left.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 18 VILLA MONTEREY UNIT 4B AMD MCR 017403
Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautifully designed 2-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom townhome located in the historic district in the heart of Scottsdale. With an inviting spacious layout, this home offers an ideal blend of comfort and style. The kitchen is well-sized, offering plenty of counter space and storage, making it a functional area for cooking and meal prep. The owner's suite is generously sized and offers easy access to the main bathroom. The second bedroom is currently set up as a den, providing a flexible space for an office, media room, or additional lounge area. Step outside to your easy-to-maintain backyard, where you can enjoy the Arizona sunshine in a low-maintenance space, perfect for unwinding or entertaining.  Just minutes away from shopping, restaurant and entertainment.  Must See!!

This  magnificent property underwent a complete head to toe remodel featuring gorgeous ''polar express'' quartzite countertops, custom cabinetry, Sub-Zero / Wolf appliances, premium plumbing fixtures/lighting and so much more (see documents tab for full list).  The master suite is very spacious with lovely views of your own garden oasis private patio. This unit also features 3 HVAC units with wi-fi connected thermostats, two side by side parking spaces and a storage unit.

Step into the elevator from two convenient parking spaces, and your assigned EV parking station. Ascend to the top floor, where unit 3009 awaits - a tranquil corner unit with stunning views and abundant natural light. Inside you'll note the meticulous maintenance and thoughtful design. The gourmet kitchen features granite countertops, stainless appliances, gas range, richly stained cabinetry, and a welcoming breakfast bar that unites the great room. Public Remarks: Views, views, views! Check out this stunning contemporary condo in Optima Camelview Village. With tons of natural light, this north-facing unit features an open living layout and a private balcony. The updated kitchen boasts a waterfall quartz countertop island, newer GE stainless steel appliances, a breakfast bar, a separate dining area, and plenty of cabinet space. The large bedrooms include walk-in closets with built-in shelving. The primary bath features dual sinks, a tiled walk-in shower, and an automatic open toilet. This unit includes two assigned parking spots. The extended patio is perfect for enjoying the gorgeous, lush landscaping.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautifully renovated 2-bedroom, 2-Full bath condo in Camelback House, perfectly situated next to Fashion Square Mall and just minutes from Old Town Scottsdale's fine dining and entertainment. The modern kitchen impresses with stainless steel appliances, quartz waterfall countertops, and custom cabinetry with a built-in desk seating area. Additional upgrades include new flooring throughout and a stunning walk-in shower. With HOA approval for short-term rentals, this condo is not only a luxurious residence but also a fantastic investment opportunity.

Legal Description (Abbrev): VILLA MONTEREY 1    TR 6 S50' & 1/87 INT IN TR 27
Public Remarks: Discover a rare gem in the heart of Scottsdale's historic district! Nestled in the highly sought-after 55+ Villa Monterey community and located directly on the canal, this stunning home has been thoughtfully upgraded with over $130,000 in modern enhancements.    Step inside to an inviting light-filled sanctuary, where sleek Luxury Vinyl Plank (LVP) flooring, smooth textured walls, and exquisite walnut sliding barn doors create an elegant yet cozy ambiance. The open-concept layout flows seamlessly from the formal dining area to the fully upgraded kitchen, featuring stylish pull-out cabinetry and premium appliances.
Directions: South on Miller Rd to Rancho Vista, West to 74th Pl to address.

Legal Description (Abbrev): SCOTTSDALE HOUSE PLAT 2 AMD 127-24 BLDG 10 APT UNIT B & .3112 PERCENT OF LAND & COM ELEMENTS
Public Remarks: CHARMING/MOVE IN READY, 1 bedroom, 1 bath single level condo with west facing living room window views of CAMELBACK MOUNTAIN.  Beautiful UPDATES throughout with freshly painted kitchen, new backsplash tile, new wood butcher block countertops.  The renovated bathroom has new vanity, tile, and glass barn door shower.  Travertine tile and new carpet in living/bedroom.  Vaulted ceiling and private south facing patio.  WONDERFUL LOCATION with 24-hour attendant gated community with green grass and landscaped pathways.  AMENITIES include heated pool, restaurant w/delivery, beauty/barber salon, massage therapists, workout facility.  Across the street from Fashion Sq. Mall, Old Town Scottsdale's Art, entertainment, restaurants, and shopping. Pets are welcome, 30-day minimum rental.
Directions: North on 68th St. at Camelback, Scottsdale House Community on the left, attendant gated.

Public Remarks: An exceptional opportunity to own a completely reimagined, single-level residence in the coveted 55+ community of Villa Monterey. This impeccably remodeled three-bedroom, two-bathroom home has been transformed with the highest level of craftsmanship and attention to detail?offering timeless elegance, modern functionality, and effortless living with no interior steps throughout. The open, thoughtfully designed floor plan showcases top-of-the-line finishes, including designer tile, marble, and quartz surfaces that flow seamlessly throughout the home. The sophisticated primary suite features a spacious walk-in closet and a spa-inspired bathroom, while the secondary bedrooms offer comfort and flexibility for guests or a home office. The gourmet kitchen is a true showstopper?

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT D2006 SAGE CONDOMINIUM AMD MCR 115217
Public Remarks: This Rare, Exquisite home at The Sage is a community where modern luxury meets timeless charm. This beautifully designed residence in the heart of downtown Old Town Scotts offers lots of natural light and peaceful views of the canal and bike path from every window. Just a short canal-side walk to world-class shopping and dining, this home provides a lifestyle of unparalleled beauty & accessibility. The gourmet kitchen features top-of-the-line Dacor appliances and a reverse osmosis water filtration system. Soaring ceilings, a cozy gas fireplace, and custom Hunter Douglas window treatments enhance the inviting living space. Spacious split floorplan, laundry room, custom upgrades throughout. Must see Will Not Last Long! .  Features

Public Remarks: Welcome home to your jewel box in the heart of Scottsdale's high-profile 85251 zip code! This modern masterpiece sits in Royale Gardens, a lush and tranquil tree-lined community reminiscent of Old Hollywood. Completely redeveloped from the foundation up and featuring both Scandinavian and contemporary design, this custom two-story residence features a rare 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom layout that is both spacious and perfect for entertaining. Stunning from the finest materials used, including imported hardwood floors, floating staircase, glass enclosed showers, recessed LED lighting, marble bathrooms, and a world-class gourmet kitchen with Sub-Zero integrated refrigerator and Corian countertops.
Directions: From Camelback Rd, Got north 2 blocks. Turn right (east) on Rancho Vista. Right (south) on 72nd Way. House is on east side of street.

Public Remarks: Beautiful condo in the heart of old-town Scottsdale!  2 master bedrooms with 2 bathrooms.  Contemporary and modern, sleek and luxury all combined into one prime location.  Home can be sold fully furnished if one desires.  Great for those wanting to add to their investment portfolio or wanting to be near the Scottsdale lifestyle.  Open floor plan.  Kitchen has an eat-up bar seating, cooktop with vent hood, all stainless steel appliances. Bedroom 1 has an en-suite bath with oversized shower.  Additional full-sized bathroom next to Bedroom 2.  Plenty of storage space throughout the home. Balcony area with screens so you can enjoy year-round.  Community has a heated pool and spa, BBQ area, putting green, and assigned parking.  Just a short distance walk to Camelback Fashion Square with plenty

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 11 CASA GRANADA EAST TOWNHOUSES MCR 011302
Public Remarks: Seller financing available! Just blocks away from Old Town Scottsdale and Fashion Square, this fully renovated townhouse puts you steps away from the city's best dining, shopping, and culture. Inside this 2-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home you'll find clean lines and warm textures with floating white oak stairs, wide-plank flooring, and new cabinetry, doors, and fixtures throughout.     The kitchen has been completely reimagined with new appliances, fresh counters, and recessed lighting, opening into the dining and living areas. Upstairs, both bedrooms are generously sized, each paired with its own updated bathroom and walk-in closet. One featuring a fully tiled walk-in shower and double vanity, the other a sleek tiled tub/shower combo.
Directions: Camelback & Miller Directions: GO SOUTH ON MILLER ONE BLOCK..''CASA GRANADA EAST'' WILL BE ON EAST SIDE, DRIVEWAY D, CARPORT W/2 CAR PARKING LOOK FOR AMADEUS REALTY SIGN.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 14 ASCENT AT THE PHOENICIAN GOLF VILLAS CONDOMINIUM MCR 156704
Public Remarks: Nestled in the shadow of Camelback Mountain at prestigious Ascent at the Phoenician, this exquisite golf villa offers an unparalleled lifestyle. Located on the first hole of the renowned Phoenician Golf Course, this guard-gated community features only 30 exclusive golf villas, each with a private two-car garage. This stunning residence boasts three spacious en-suite bedrooms, complemented by a stylish powder bath and open concept floor plan making it perfect for both relaxation and entertaining. The villa's design emphasizes seamless indoor/outdoor living, highlighted by floor-to-ceiling stackable glass doors that frame breathtaking panoramic views of the lush golf course and the vibrant Phoenix skyline. The heart of the home is the exquisite Bulthaup
Directions: From Camelback Road, head north on Invergordon (64th Street), turn left at the guard gated entrance of Asent at the Phoenician.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 301 CASA BLANCA DETACHED HOMES MCR 033738
Public Remarks: Situated on a detached corner parcel for maximum privacy inside coveted Historic Casa Blanca Phase 3 lies this stunning Spanish/Moroccan contemporary with soaring views of Camelback and beautiful sunsets. Low care manicured landscaping complete with stone fountain and outdoor fireplace, 2 car garage, prime location for safety and tranquility. High ceilings with brand new Lutron lighting system, automated shades, everything new to the studs. Custom Thermador appliances. Marble and quartz counters, lots of natural light, soft oak floors and generous primary. Truly turnkey complete with an added custom built bar. Rich, timeless & elegant, enjoy tennis, pickleball, and 3 heated pools in the convenience of a manned guard gate. Minutes from Fashion Square Mall on most desirable street in PV.

Public Remarks: Imagine landing in Phoenix, catching an Uber and entering your turn-key Scottsdale condo in less than 25 minutes. And while you are visiting, you never have to get behind the wheel! Head out to the canal for some morning exercise, grab some lunch and a glass of wine at Postino on Highland (0.4 miles away), take in Spring Training game (less than 2 miles away) and then maybe catch a movie (0.6 miles away). All this activity so close by, but yet, this condo sits away from the hustle and bustle of Old Town Scottsdale. In 2019, a top-notch remodel made the interior of this condo just a special as its neighborhood. All new windows, window coverings, cabinets, flooring, bath room fixtures, and a full-sized washer and dryer and more! No rental restrictions.
Directions: GPS will take you right there! :)

Public Remarks: Welcome to a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a brand-new luxury condominium nestled within the exclusive Phoenician Resort. This stunning residence combines timeless elegance, high-end finishes, and breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain and city lights. This spacious 1-bedroom + den, 2 full bath home is thoughtfully designed for modern living. An open great room concept features 10' ceilings and expansive walls of glass, flooding the space with natural light and creating a seamless connection to the outdoors. A cozy gas fireplace adds warmth and sophistication to the living area, making it the perfect place to relax or entertain. The Provenza wide-planked oak floors throughout provide a warm and luxurious feel, while the gourmet kitchen?crafted by Bulthaup?is a chef's dream.

Public Remarks: Welcome to 7751 E Glenrosa Ave #C5, nestled in the heart of vibrant Scottsdale, just moments from the lively energy of Old Town. This updated gem combines convenience, style, and comfort in an unbeatable location. Inside you'll discover a freshly painted interior that radiates a bright, modern vibe. The updated kitchen features sleek finishes, perfect for entertaining or preparing your favorite meals. With the added convenience of in-unit laundry, you'll enjoy a seamless lifestyle. The community offers a peaceful retreat, while still being just minutes away from Old Town Scottsdale's renowned dining, shopping, and entertainment. Whether you're strolling through the charming streets, enjoying the local art galleries, or savoring the nightlife, this home places you at the center of it all!
Directions: Camelback SOUTH at 78th Street, WEST on Glenrosa Ave to Alhambra Terrace Comm. Park on street past 3rd blng by grassy area. Walk up sidewalk by covered parking area to C Building, Unit on Upper Rght

Public Remarks: Beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath single level charmer in highly sought after Historic Villa Monterey, Old Town Scottsdale's most desirable 55+ community. This home is truly special! Sitting on a highly desirable corner lot, right next to a green belt and across from the architecturally pleasing water fountain. Private front patio is a hidden gem for friendly gatherings; mature landscape, grape vines, and old world feel pavers. Interior is welcoming with hardwood flooring and extended livings space. The faux fireplace adds ambiance. Primary bedroom is customized with sought after walk in closet, side windows, and updated bath. Beautiful solid wood doors. Delightful backyard with custom seating accommodates sleeping under the stars! Small workshop/shed has electric for the hobbyist.
Directions: North on Miller to Coolidge. East through Villa Monterey entrance. Home is on the N/W corner of Coolidge and 76th Pl

Public Remarks: Unbeatable Views & Value in Optima Camelview!    Perched just below the penthouse, this stunning split-floorplan 2-bed, 2-bath condo with a versatile bonus room offers the best views at the best price. Priced to sell, this unit represents the strongest value on the two most desirable floors of Optima Camelview. Enjoy breathtaking views of the lush courtyard and sparkling pool, all from the comfort of your stylish and functional living space.  The bright, updated interior features light oak wood laminate flooring throughout, creating an inviting and modern ambiance. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, a gas cooktop, sleek light countertops, and subway tile backsplash. The master bathroom exudes elegance with its modern white finishes.
Directions: Scottsdale Rd & Rancho Vista Drive Directions: North on Scottsdale Road to Rancho Vista. West on Rancho Vista. Enter parking garage and park in the visitor area.

Public Remarks: Experience the vibrant heart of Old Town Scottsdale living in this sophisticated townhome. Step inside and be greeted by 10ft ceilings, rich hardwood floors, and elegant crown molding, creating an inviting ambiance. The chef's kitchen is a culinary dream, featuring stainless steel appliances, a gas range, an LG see-through refrigerator, sleek granite countertops, and a Dacor gas stove. Retreat to the luxurious primary suite with dual sinks, a separate tub and shower, and a walk-in closet. Guest bedrooms offer comfort and style with ceiling fans and tasteful window treatments overlooking the charming neighborhood. Enjoy cozy evenings by the gas fireplace in the living area, and outside, a private patio with a gas hookup is perfect for al fresco dining.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this breathtaking 2 bed, plus den/office 1271 sq ft condo. The entire condo has been professionally remodeled and furnished with modern contemporary upgrades. Upgrades include Grohe fixtures, Custom lighting throughout, Dimplex E-Fireplace, Perlick Wine Cabinet, Miele Dishwasher, GE Cafe Refrigerator, Electric blinds, Gorgeous California Closets, Toto bidet toilets, and many more top of the line features. Unit also includes 2 side by side parking spaces (1 with ELECTRIC CHARGER) and a storage unit.Rarely does an Optima condo offer such captivating views of the pool and premium features.Top-of-the-line amenities in the luxurious Optima Camelview Village, with it's unbeatable location & state of the art architecture.
Directions: Scottsdale Rd to Rancho Vista - Underground garage in the RED guest parking spot.

Public Remarks: PRESTIGIOUS PHOENICIAN EAST?A GUARD-GATED COMMUNITY. Stunning 2-BR, 2-Bath, 2-Car Garage home perched on the 5th tee of the Phoenician Resort Golf Course. Immerse yourself in views of the golf course, pond, and nature from the expansive patio.   Features: Elegant 24'' Travertine Stone flooring throughout, seamlessly transitioning to a spacious back patio.  Natural light-filled spaces via numerous clerestory windows and skylights.  Vaulted wood-beam ceilings enhance the architectural appeal. A circular dining room with a vaulted ceiling. Split-bedroom plan offers ultimate privacy. Large primary suite with direct patio access.  Well-appointed cabinetry and Laundry room. Ideally located near Old Town Scottsdale and the Scottsdale Waterfront, with a quick 15-minute drive to Sky Harbor.
Directions: From the Camelback Road signal - turn North on Invergordon (64th St). Look for the Phoenician East Guard Gate Entry on East side of Invergordon. The Guard will Direct you to the Villa.

Public Remarks: Explore this lovely Old Town Scottsdale Townhome nestled within the Paradise Villas community, home to only 16 townhouses. An extraordinary front unit boasts an outdoor patio that saturates the living space with natural light. This townhouse features 2 bedrooms, 1.5  bathrooms, along with the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer, just steps away from the community pool. Perfect location to enjoy Scottsdale's finest shops and dinning. Engage in the excitement of Spring training, Downtown Scottsdale, Civic Center & Performing Arts, weekly art walks, and  an array of nearby events. Walking distance to bike path and incredible hiking trails and 20 min drive to ASU.
Directions: South on Scottsdale to Rancho Vista Dr, east to 73rd St, north to property on the right/east side.

Public Remarks: Beautiful first floor unit with a quiet patio. Conveniently located across the street from Fashion Square Mall and within walking distance to old town Scottsdale. This unit is move in ready, all furniture and equipment convey, with updates including updated kitchen, flooring and a bathroom with tiled shower. Make this your winter getaway or a fantastic vacation rental in the heart of Scottsdale. This complex allows short-term rentals, per HOA, and features four pools, multiple BBQ's, lush grounds and laundry facilities.

Public Remarks: Nestled in Scottsdale's coveted Briarwood subdivision, this 3 bed 2.5 bath house boasts: large family room and split private living room which can double as an extra bedroom, wood beams, can lights t/o, fireplace, large sliders into the luscious backyard, granite countertops, shaker cabinets in the kitchen, subway tile backsplash, double oven, wine fridge, stainless appliances, RO water purifier, spacious primary suite with large walk-in closet, access to patio from primary, atrium in primary bath, plantation shutters t/o, additional mini-split AC in secondary living room, newer AC unit, large covered patio, HEATED pebble-tec pool, epoxy garage floor, storage w/ sink off garage, OWNED solar panels and much more! Close to dining, shopping and entertainment. Excellent school district!

Public Remarks: Your Perfect Slice of Old Town Scottsdale! This is the closest 3-bedroom home at this price point within walking distance to the entertainment district! The new Whole Foods at Miller & Indian School (just a 5-min walk) adds even more value. Plus, you're steps from Greenbelt Park and part of a charming courtyard community with a sparkling pool. Inside, enjoy a spacious kitchen, indoor laundry, and guest-friendly half bath downstairs. Upstairs: three bedrooms, a hall bath, and a primary suite with its own bath and private patio. A beautiful backyard leads to your covered parking spot. Furniture negotiable. Airbnb/STR-friendly!
Directions: Head west on E Indian School Rd, Turn right onto N Parkway Ave, Turn right onto E Heatherbrae Ave, Turn left to access the community. Once parked search for unit #13.

Public Remarks: Exquisite Fully Renovated Scottsdale Home with Luxury Finishes nestled in the heart of Scottsdale, this stunning, fully renovated 2025 residence offers the perfect blend of modern elegance and timeless craftsmanship. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed, from the Stella Bay hardwood floors to the custom wood cabinetry & Dolomite Alba Pietra countertops throughout the residence that adds warmth and sophistication throughout the home.    Step inside to discover an open-concept floor plan, bathed in natural light with soaring ceilings. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring handcrafted wood cabinets, high-end stainless steel appliances, and a spacious peninsula perfect for entertaining. Truly a needle in a haystack for this Palo Verde Community!
Directions: From AZ-101 Take exit 45, Head W on McDonald Dr, Turn left onto N Cattletrack Rd, Turn right onto E Palo Verde Dr, Turn right onto Villa Palo Verde, Left on the 1st cross street to home on the right.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautifully updated Old Town Scottsdale condo in the highly sought-after Sage community, where you're just steps from the heart of Old Town yet tucked away in a quiet, private setting. This upgraded first-floor unit features an oversized patio, perfect for entertaining or relaxing, along with recent improvements including new tile flooring, a brand-new A/C unit, and a sleek modern fireplace. Enjoy direct access to the Scottsdale Canal Path, and take advantage of luxury amenities such as two reserved parking spaces with storage lockers, a resort-style pool, fitness center, residents' lounge, and wine cellar. With a spacious open layout and refined finishes throughout, this is your opportunity to own in one of Scottsdale's best condo communities.

Agency Name: Karen Abinet Home In Motion Realty (kahi001)
Public Remarks: Priced to Sell!! Seller wants this sold and the price reflects that!! This fractional 2 bedroom, 2-1/2 bath unit with a convertible den, plunge pool, hot tub, grill, fire pit, fireplace, full kitchen with twice daily housekeeping, golf cart with golf course view and end unit. The master bath has a soaker tub. Week 12 Friday-Friday and week 42 Friday to Friday with a floating summer week. Only one week either in the spring or fall is required to stay at the Phoenician. Other weeks can be converted to Marriott points for 240,000 points each unless it's week 12 for 300,000 points. Points can be held and used up to six years! Just need 60 days notice to convert. The unit comes with its own concierge service for the two prime weeks and summer exchange week, but to use the points.

Public Remarks: Nestled in Scottsdale's coveted 'The Plaza' subdivision, this exquisite Spanish-style home offers a perfect blend of luxury and comfort. With 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a thoughtful open floor plan, it's ideal for both relaxation and entertaining. Enjoy stunning views of the Praying Monk and multiple patios designed for seamless indoor/outdoor living. A European-style kitchen, grand vaulted ceilings, and two spacious master suites enhance the home's elegance. The manicured grounds feature multiple fruit trees, adding charm to this tranquil retreat. Don't miss your chance to own this romantic villa, secluded yet close to all Scottsdale has to offer.
Directions: Head east on Palo Verde Dr from Scottsdale Rd. Turn left into The Plaza community. Take the first left in the community and the property is on the left corner.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 203 ASCENT AT THE PHOENICIAN MOUNTAINSIDE CONDOMINIUMS MCR 168310
Public Remarks: Brand New Condominium ready for immediate occupancy in Ascent at the Phoenician. Tucked into the base of revered Camelback Mountain, the Ascent Mountainside Residences are a new condominium community immediately adjacent to The Phoenician Resort. This home features contemporary architecture integrating warm, natural materials, an expansive stacking door system large outdoor patio literally on Camelback Mountain and a buit-in gas grill. Luxury finishes include an exquisite Bulthaup Kitchen, Provenza wood floors, Sub Zero Wolf appliances & 10' ceilings. This home has a large primary bath, a walk-in pantry and loads of storage. The Ascent Mountainside Residences incorporate the Sonoran Desert landscape directly into its these condominium homes in the most enviable location in Scottsdale.
Directions: From Camelback and Invergordon/64th Street, North on Invergordon to the gated entrance to Ascent at the Phoenician, inside the gate take 2nd right on Camelback Ridge Rd to 5000 North Camelback Ridge

The generous front and rear yards provide an ideal setting for relaxation and entertaining. The community offers exceptional amenities, including a resort-style pool and spa, walking and biking paths, promoting an active and engaging lifestyle. Public Remarks: Experience Luxury Living at Camelback House!  Welcome to a stunning turn-key condo that perfectly encapsulates luxury and style. This residence has been meticulously remodeled from top to bottom. Washer Dryer may be added inside unit! Whether you're an investor or simply seeking a lavish lifestyle, this property has something to offer everyone.  An Investor's Dream! Top-rated Airbnb destination. It is income-generating and comes available fully furnished, making it a seamless addition to any property portfolio. The location and amenities make it attractive to both short-term renters and long-term residents.  Prime Location Situated in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale, this condo provides unparalleled access to one of the most vibrant areas in Arizona. Walkthrough Video!

Public Remarks: Ideally situated in a prestigious guard-gated community, this home offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and resort-style living. Located just 5 minutes from Old Town Scottsdale and adjacent to Paradise Valley, you'll enjoy quick access to the area's best shopping, dining, and entertainment?including Scottsdale Fashion Square, top-rated restaurants, theaters, and vibrant nightlife. Community amenities include three sparkling pools, a relaxing spa, a fully equipped fitness center, a clubhouse, and even shuffleboard courts. Whether you're seeking a full-time residence or a seasonal getaway, this home delivers both luxury and lifestyle. Plus, with Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport just 15-20 minutes away, travel is a breeze!

Public Remarks: Best Value in Winfield Place!    Tucked poolside in the lush, well-kept community of Winfield Place, this ground-level remodeled end unit offers Scottsdale living made easy. Just steps from the Arizona Canal Trail and minutes to Fashion Square, the location blends resort-style serenity with unbeatable walkability.    Inside, enjoy dual-pane windows; including an extra in the kitchen for added natural light, white tile floors, plush bedroom carpet, granite countertops, solid wood cabinetry, and generous closet space. The upgraded bathroom features a custom-tiled walk-in shower with bench and a tall vanity, ideal for snowbirds or year-round comfort.    Step outside to your private covered patio with bonus storage and a front security door for peace of mind.
Directions: Head west on E Chaparral Rd. After the canal make your 1st right turn into the Winfield Place condos. Continue straight to the end & make a left. Building 9 on the left side, ground end unit 159B.
Cross Street: E Chaparral Rd & N Miller Rd

Public Remarks: Welcome the heart of Scottsdale!     Location, Location, Location!     Enjoy the plethora of amenities on-site including Full-service Restaurant-Bar/lounge-Resort style pool/spa-Full-service salon-Gated security and so much more!    This updated 1-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom residence has been updated from top to bottom, offering modern luxury in every corner. Situated in a prime location, you'll be just moments away from Scottsdale's finest dining, world-class golf courses, the scenic trails of Camelback Mountain, and upscale shopping. With sleek finishes, open-concept kitchen, and attention to detail throughout, this home perfectly combines comfort and style.     Enjoy the best of Scottsdale living with amenities to match. Legal Description (Abbrev): OPTIMA CAMELVIEW VILLAGE CONDOMINIUM 2ND AMD MCR 803-35 UNIT 4004 BLDG 2 7121 E RANCHO VISTA DR (PLE
Public Remarks: Luxury Pied--Terre with Stunning Camelback Views - Experience elevated living in this stylish 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo featuring sweeping views of Camelback Mountain and Scottsdale's iconic sunsets. Designed with both elegance and efficiency in mind, this home offers a comfortable and refined escape in the heart of the city. The flexible floor plan allows the second bedroom to easily function as a home office or guest space. Expansive floor-to-ceiling windows fill the interior with natural light and frame the breathtaking desert landscape. Enjoy rare amenities including two dedicated parking spaces and a private storage unit. Whether you're seeking a full-time residence or a sophisticated Scottsdale retreat, this property offers the perfect lock-and-leave lifestyle.
Directions: From Camelback Rd head north on Scottsdale Rd, turn left at E Rancho Vista Dr, at stop sign veer left and head under building, turn right and park in Guest Parking.
Cross Street: N Scottsdale Rd and E Rancho Vista Dr

Move-in ready Mountainside Residence 109 at Ascent at the Phoenician offers over 3800 interior square feet and is located in the best space of the building for stunning up close Camelback Mountain views plus great privacy. Huge patio for easy indoor outdoor living and sited adjacent to the new Mountainside Club.  Enjoy amenities galore!
Directions: From Camelback Road and Invergordon/64th Street, North to Phoenician Blvd., left/west through the guard gate into Ascent at the Phoenician.

Public Remarks: Welcome to Canyon Residences!  A one-of-a-kind, boutique luxury housing enclave located at the base of the famed Camelback Mountain and adjacent to the 16th hole of the Phoenician Golf Course!  With only 5 residences ? a select few will enjoy this special offering!  The Canyon Residences are designed with luxury in mind with a soft desert contemporary style, open floorplans and expansive outdoor living spaces.  All units feature 3 bedrooms + 3.5 baths and a private den with a spacious 2 car garage.  Opulent finish quality includes stunning Bulthaup Kitchens, Wolf and Sub Zero appliances, Western Windows and Doors and soft, natural finishes including wood floors throughout, natural stone counters and floors and Rohl plumbing fixtures.
Directions: West on Camelback Rd to Phoenician Blvd. Under Construction - Appointment Required.

Public Remarks: Your cozy retreat right in the center of all the action! Nestled in a 24-hr guard gated resort-style community with all the amenities you can dream of! You will have full access to the pool & spa, fitness center, library, conference room, putting green, & so much more! Enjoy the stunning panoramic mountain views while you're surrounded by exquisite lush landscaping! Invite your family & friends over for drinks & dinner at the on-sight restaurant/bar or relax while getting a massage & facial in the beauty salon! Within walking distance, you're just moments away from all of Scottsdale's finest shopping & dining! This dog-friendly home includes turf off the back patio and 2 doggy doors! Assigned covered parking is conveniently next to the front door of unit & comes w/private storage closet.
Directions: North on 68th St from Camelback Rd. Left at Scottsdale House guard just before Chaparral Rd. Straight down towards clubhouse & turn left. Then right around clubhouse. Left on C St. (Unit on right.)

Public Remarks: RESORT-STYLE LIVING at its best in a 24/7 guard gated community. This charming 2 bedroom/2 bath townhome is designer owned and completely charming! Just minutes from Camelback Mountain, Fashion Square, Old Town Scottsdale, and all the best dining and entertainment Scottsdale has to offer. Community amenities include 3 swimming pools, hot tub, sauna, fitness room, tennis court, basketball court, clubhouse, and an HOA that includes landscaping and exterior maintenance of your home. This is great as a low maintenance second home, for busy singles, or those who want to live in a fabulous Scottsdale location. Makes a great rental too. This property is on a LAND LEASE (monthly HOA and Land Lease total is $1,110)

Public Remarks: Welcome to Canyon Residences!  A one-of-a-kind, boutique luxury housing enclave located at the base of the famed Camelback Mountain and adjacent to the 16th hole of the Phoenician Golf Course!  With only 5 residences ? a select few will enjoy this special offering!  The Canyon Residences are designed with luxury in mind with a soft desert contemporary style, open floorplans and expansive outdoor living spaces.  All units feature 3 bedrooms + 3.5 baths and a private den with a spacious 2 car garage.  Opulent finish quality includes stunning Bulthaup Kitchens, Wolf and Sub Zero appliances, Western Windows and Doors and soft, natural finishes including wood floors throughout, natural stone counters and floors and Rohl plumbing fixtures.
Directions: West on Camelback Rd to Phoenician Blvd. Under Construction - Appointment Required.

Public Remarks: Welcome to Canyon Residences!  A one-of-a-kind, boutique luxury housing enclave located at the base of the famed Camelback Mountain and adjacent to the 16th hole of the Phoenician Golf Course!  With only 5 residences ? a select few will enjoy this special offering!  The Canyon Residences are designed with luxury in mind with a soft desert contemporary style, open floorplans and expansive outdoor living spaces.  All units feature 3 bedrooms + 3.5 baths and a private den with a spacious 2 car garage.  Opulent finish quality includes stunning Bulthaup Kitchens, Wolf and Sub Zero appliances, Western Windows and Doors and soft, natural finishes including wood floors throughout, natural stone counters and floors and Rohl plumbing fixtures.
Directions: West on Camelback Rd to Phoenician Blvd. Under Construction - Appointment Required.

Public Remarks: 2 bed, 2 bath condo at Optima Camelview, complete with a bonus room that works perfectly as a home office or formal dining space. This is one of the most popular layouts in the community?but with a unique twist! The primary bedroom is semi-open to the living area, giving it a cool, loft-style vibe. Want more privacy? It can easily be closed off to make it a fully private bedroom. Fun fact: the original owner, who's an architect, designed it that way!  The condo has tons of storage, sleek cabinetry in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances, travertine flooring, granite counters, and a full-size washer and dryer. Step outside to your own private terrace with nice views of the community.

Public Remarks: Welcome to Canyon Residences!  A one-of-a-kind, boutique luxury housing enclave located at the base of the famed Camelback Mountain and adjacent to the 16th hole of the Phoenician Golf Course!  With only 5 residences ? a select few will enjoy this special offering!  The Canyon Residences are designed with luxury in mind with a soft desert contemporary style, open floorplans and expansive outdoor living spaces.  All units feature 3 bedrooms + 3.5 baths and a private den with a spacious 2 car garage.  Opulent finish quality includes stunning Bulthaup Kitchens, Wolf and Sub Zero appliances, Western Windows and Doors and soft, natural finishes including wood floors throughout, natural stone counters and floors and Rohl plumbing fixtures.
Directions: West on Camelback Rd to Phoenician Blvd. Under Construction - Appointment Required.

Public Remarks: This stunning 1 bedroom Condo is perfectly situated in Old Town Scottsdale. Indian Terrace is a boutique community of just 47 units within walking distance to world class shopping, dining and entertainment. The unit itself is cozy, functional and highly upgraded. From the granite counters and stainless steel appliances to the crown molding and durable laminate wood flooring. LED lighting, rainfall shower head and gorgeous window treatments... and available fully furnished should you wish! The patio space has been delightfully decorated and offers additional storage space, often lacking in a smaller unit. The community offers a generous pool and spa area, with a grill station, fridge, bar and multiple seating areas.
Directions: East on Indian School Rd to 78th St. North on 78th to community entrance on your left.

Public Remarks: Camelback House is one of the last great values in all of Old Town Scottsdale. This unbeatable location is at the base of Camelback Mountain & steps from the world class Scottsdale Fashion Square Mall. This optimally situated end unit has only one shared wall & no one living above or beneath you which provides rare privacy in a complex of this size. The complex has many amenities including heated pools throughout, very low annual tax rates for the area & friendly rental regulations that do not limit the length of stays. All of these benefits make Camelback House one of the best investment opportunities in Scottsdale. The unit itself has been tastefully upgraded w/ new laminate flooring & the price includes all furniture so it is a truly turnkey property for the next owner to enjoy.

Public Remarks: Great investment or owner occupant opportunity in Old Town! Perfectly placed ground level turn key condo with direct access to the pool and hot tub feautures an open and bright floorplan, neutral finshes, remodeled kitchen with quartz counters, stainless appliances and island. Cozy beehive fireplace, open living/dining room with french doors to one of two patio spaces! Inside laundry and covered parking in a prime location! Walking distance to Old Town and all it has to offer-shops, restraunts, spring training, yoga-all right there! Downtown Tempe, ASU and freeway access less than 5 miles away. Has been used as a successful short term rental, but is perfect for a lock and leave or owner/occupant. HOA includes water, sewer, trash, blanket insurance and roof maintenance/repair.
Directions: South on Goldwater to 70th Street. West on 70th Street, follow curve. East on 4th Street. Complex is in a cul-de-sac. Unit is at the south end of the complex on the west side.

Public Remarks: PRICE IMPROVEMENT! Beautifully remodeled, single-level townhome offers the perfect blend of modern upgrades and comfortable living. This home features white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and light oak wood floors throughout. Bright, open floorplan with vaulted ceilings lets in an abundance of natural light. You will be amazed by the amount of space and storage this home has to offer. Backyard is an entertainer's dream. The bar and seating area with two fire features add to the amazing ambiance of this outdoor oasis. This property is a  perfect full-time residence or enjoy the lock and leave convenience. Fabulous proximity to Old Town Scottsdale, dining, entertainment and shopping. A must see!
Directions: North on Scottsdale Rd. East on Valley View Rd. to the property on the south side.

Public Remarks: Beautifully updated and fully remodeled condo just steps from Old Town. The open-concept main level features modern finishes, a stunning 10-ft kitchen island, and Frigidaire Professional appliances (2021). The spacious primary suite offers dual vanities, a walk-in shower, and two closets, including a large walk-in. Enjoy mountain views from your private rooftop deck. Upgrades include Anderson 100 series windows/door with SmartSun366 glass (2023), reverse osmosis system, water softener (2021), and full stud-to-finish remodel (2021). Luxury, comfort, and prime location in one.

Public Remarks: Step into sophisticated luxury at Scottsdale's premier high-rise residence. This immaculate 2,041-square-foot condo offers 2 spacious bedrooms, 2.5 elegantly appointed bathrooms, and a thoughtfully designed open-concept great room with a split-bedroom layout?each with direct access to a sprawling private balcony where you can take in sweeping sunset views of Camelback Mountain and the McDowells. Refined light oak finishes, rich hardwood flooring, and a large entertainer's island elevate the living space with warmth and style. This residence includes two dedicated parking spaces and two private storage units for ultimate convenience. Enjoy resort-style amenities including a rooftop pool with panoramic views, a state-of-the-art fitness center, an elegant Residents Club Room
Directions: East on Camelback rd to Marshall way, south, and first left to Valet.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 129A WINFIELD PLACE PHASE 2 CONDOMINIUM HOMES MCR 022640
Public Remarks: Ground floor unit, no stairs - best location in complex.  Steps from main pool and clubhouse/laundry.  Move in ready one bedroom one bath unit with private entrance and large patio.   Covered carport.  Winfield Place is walking distance to all Old Town has to offer and it is adjacent to Arizona Canal Path for endless miles of walking/running/biking from Tempe to North Scottsdale!  There are two pools/hot tubs and a clubhouse.  Rentals are allowed with 31 day minimum.
Directions: NORTH ON SCOTTSDALE ROAD, EAST ON CHAPARRAL - WINFIELD PLACE ON NORTH SIDE OF STREET

Public Remarks: Welcome to Winfield Place Community! Fall in love with this ground-level 1-bedroom/1-bathroom unit now on the market! Come inside to find a bright living room that flows seamlessly into the dining area. Tile flooring, neutral tone, and dual pane windows are features that can't be left unsaid. The kitchen offers recessed lighting, stainless steel appliances, and plenty of white cabinets for easy organization. The sizable bedroom provides comfort and relaxation, complete with bi-folding closets. Unwind under the covered patio while enjoying tranquil surroundings. Take a quick dip into the community pool or spa; just steps from the patio door.  Additional amenities include the community clubhouse featuring billiard tables, TV, game room, cozy sofas by the fireplace, & seating areas.
Directions: Head south on N Scottsdale Rd. Turn left onto E Chaparral Rd. Turn left. Home will be on the left.

Public Remarks: Welcome to El Chaparral Villas! This beautifully maintained 2-bedroom condo combines comfort and contemporary style. Step inside to discover inviting tile flooring, recessed lighting, and a spacious living room perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests. The dining area, complete with a convenient dry bar, flows effortlessly into a modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and ample neutral cabinetry. The primary bedroom offers direct backyard access, an en-suite bathroom, and a generous walk-in closet. Outside, unwind on your cozy covered patio?an ideal space for sipping your morning coffee or evening refreshments.  Enjoy exceptional community amenities including a sparkling pool, spa, fitness center, and more. Ideally located just minutes from

Public Remarks: Charming home in the desirable Monte Vivienda! Turn key fully furnished available on seperate bill of sale.  Offering 2 beds, 2.5 baths, and a 2 car garage w/storage room. Enter to find a large formal living room. Continue onto the  kitchen to find brand new appliances, solid-surface counters, tile backsplash, recessed lighting, and ample cabinets. Neutral paint &  tile floors throughout and laminate upstares! Enjoy relaxing in the cozyback patio. The entire home was rebuilt down to the studs. New drywall cabinets toilets flooring ac, roof coating. Inspections and info available upon request. Don't forget the Community clubhouse, pool, BBQ area, & more. Great location close to shopping, dining, parks, & freeways. Must see!
Directions: miller and camelback head down minnezona rd turn into the alley on the pool for garage access,  st parking also available.

Public Remarks: This Modern, Two-Story Condo with block construction is Move-In Ready! Owner has spared no expense when remodeling. Immediately notice the tiled entry patio w/a view of the pool. Once inside you'll find a spacious family room & dining area with newly installed vinyl plank flooring, recessed canned lighting & a dining light prewire to create a special ambiance. The updated kitchen has modern cabinetry, quartz countertops & stainless steel appliances with an induction range. Both baths offer modern features such as tile, lighting, newly installed toilets, cabinets, countertops, faucets, sinks and mirrors. The bedrooms are spacious with lots of closet space and remote controlled ceiling fans. Not to be forgotten, the view of the pool and Camelback Mountain from the primary bedroom window.
Directions: North on 68th Street to Highland, East (right) on Highland to third building on the South (right) side.

Public Remarks: New Construction, BRAND NEW, never occupied, single level townhome sits at the base of the iconic Camelback Mountain and overlooks the Phoenician golf course. Professionally decorated with a TURN- KEY furniture package, this home is move in ready! Ascent at the Phoenician Golf Villas is a private 24/7 guard gated community situated next to the Phoenician Resort. This meticulously custom designed and upgraded 2-bed, 2.5 bath villa is truly a one of a kind. The living room boosts a Basalt stone wrapped fireplace with beautiful lighted shelves and a 288-bottle temperature-controlled wine wall. The kitchen features a Bulthaup kitchen with quartz counters and Sub Zero Wolf appliances. Wood floors and Rift oak doors throughout. Upgraded polished nickel kitchen and bath fixtures.
Directions: Enter thru the Phoenician & Drive to the guard house, turn right at the guard house, continue until you see Phoenician Blvd, just past Golf Club. Home will be on your right.

Public Remarks: Explore this 2-bedroom unit in the vibrant community of Inspire on Earll! Discover sleek wood-look floors and stylish light fixtures that create an inviting atmosphere. Great room offers direct access to a private balcony. The delightful kitchen features stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, a pantry, a chic tile backsplash, and a center island with a breakfast bar for casual dining. Retreat to the main bedroom, where plush carpeting and an ensuite with dual sinks, a walk-in shower, and a generous walk-in closet promise comfort and convenience. Enjoy your morning coffee or unwind with your favorite beverage on the balcony, complete with an adjacent storage room. Take advantage of the community's amenities, including a pool, spa, and fitness center. Don't miss out on this gem!
Directions: Head east on E Earll Dr, Turn left. Property will be on the left.

Public Remarks: Welcome to resort-style living in the highly desirable Maya Condominiums, just steps away from Old Town Scottsdale and Fashion Square Mall! This beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 1-bath condo making it the ideal full-time home, vacation getaway, or income-producing investment. The unit features a newly remodeled kitchen, tile flooring, and a new inside AC unit for comfort and efficiency. Enjoy a covered balcony that extends your living space outdoors perfect for morning coffee or unwinding after a day exploring the vibrant surroundings. Located on prestigious Camelback Road, this complex is short-term rental approved (Airbnb & VRBO), making it a rare find. Walk across the street to the Camelback-Miller Plaza with Starbucks, Sprouts, PetSmart, dining, and more at your fingertips!
Directions: Go west on Indian School Rd,  go right (north) on Parkway Ave to community on corner of Parkway Ave and Montecito Ave.

Public Remarks: SELLER CREDIT AVAILABLE - Experience elevated desert living in this stunning patio home, ideally situated just moments from Scottsdale Fashion Square. Showcasing unobstructed views of Camelback Mountain, this residence seamlessly blends modern sophistication with timeless design.     Step inside to discover soaring vaulted ceilings and a gourmet chef's kitchen drenched in natural light?perfectly complemented by luxury bamboo flooring that flows throughout. The elegant living room is anchored by a refined fireplace, creating a warm and inviting ambiance ideal for both entertaining and everyday living.    Step outside to your private patio, complete with real grass, twinkling caf lights, and mesmerizing mountain views?an ideal setting for al fresco dining and effortless entertaining.
Directions: North on 66th St. 1st Right into Casa Del Monte - security guard at gate. Please provide business card and photo id, if not on business card. Unit One first home on right.

Public Remarks: This beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath condo offers effortless living in the heart of Scottsdale. Just a short stroll to Fashion Square, Old Town, world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment, the location can't be beat.    Inside, you'll find stylish updates including windows, flooring, and a thoughtfully reimagined kitchen with a breakfast bar?perfect for casual dining or entertaining. Smart features like keyless entry and a NEST thermostat add ease and security, making this a perfect lock-and-leave getaway or full-time home.    Short-term rentals are allowed, offering a great opportunity for investors or those looking for flexibility. Clean, simple, and refreshingly low-maintenance, this charming unit is Scottsdale living at its best.

Legal Description (Abbrev): ROYALE GARDENS 1 AKA ROYAL GARDENS  D/P 4762-319 AMD 6826-72/NO PLAT TOG WI UNDIV INT IN COMMON ELEM
Public Remarks: **$100K price improvement from list!! Old Town, yet quiet tree lined street. Haver designed Oasis. Last sold at 1.2 Million. Split 2-bedroom (each with own baths) + den and 2.5 baths. Prior ownership did cosmetic remodel, so home is all up to date. Great Room has high ceilings, lots of natural light and a grand Fpl. Kitchen with cherry cabinets, granite counters and stainless appliances. Kitchen and Gt. Room wrap around a courtyard creating a 2nd eating or relaxing space. 1st ensuite has stand-alone soaking tub and spas shower with lots of tile and waterfall. Also, his/hers sinks, walk-in closet and private toilet. 2nd has large shower with waterfall. Den makes a great office. Hard to find attached 2 car garage with storage room & stairs to a roof deck. New roof installed 4 months ago.
Directions: North on Scottsdale Road a few blocks to Rancho Vista, East to 72nd Way and South to the home on the Right.

Public Remarks: Villa Monterey 2 is a 55+ community located  near Old Town Scottsdale. Walkable and bikeable  to restaurants, shops and easy  access to the canal, this neighborhood is a highly desirable location. The community offers a  pool and spa for outdoor living with no maintenance to the homeowner. This unit has an updated floorplan within the last 5 years,2 car carport and wonderful backyard space for dining under the stars or letting your 4 legged friend run around. The primary bedroom has an en suite bathroom w/ tub shower combo and a sit down vantiy area. There is ample closet space and plantation shutters for privacy. The secondary bedroom is convenient to the hall bath with walk in shower and also contains a large closet area. The updated kitchen is  light and bright with newer appliances.
Directions: North of Miller Rd from Camelback, East (right) on Coolidge, take the 1st street at the round about to 76th Place. Follow 76th place and it will turn into Meadowbrook Ave. The property will be on your right.

Public Remarks: Rare poolside ground floor unit in the gorgeous 3rd Ave Lofts community! This modern, open floor plan is one of the few units that have a patio door that allows direct pool access. Walk directly out to use fire pit, jacuzzi and grill. Kitchen has all stainless steel appliances. Large windows provide an abundance of natural light and the roller shades provide privacy. The community offers underground gated assigned parking spot, shared heated pool/spa, courtyard with BBQ and fireplace, newly redone fitness center, storage unit, and on-site concierge services. HOA includes Direct TV and High Speed Internet. Located in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale - shops, restaurants and nightlife are within walking distance. Also available as furnished rental.30 day minimum rental.
Directions: East on 3rd Ave to Buckboard, South to Lofts on East side of Road, Building entrance on South side.

Public Remarks: The best patio at Optima!    Why choose between Camelback Mountain views and a peaceful interior when you can have both?    This home's nearly 2,800 square foot patio wraps around the north, west, and east sides of the building, showcasing Camelback Mountain and sunset views to the west. To the east, the tranquil quiet of the award-winning grounds at Optima Camelview Village. Private, gated access allows for easy walks to Ocean 44, Toca Madera, and the rest of the luxury wing at Fashion Square. Natural gas fire pit and built-in barbecue included.
Directions: Use the Highland Ave entrance into Optima Camelview Village and park underground. 7117 building is the closest to Highland Ave and Goldwater Blvd intersection, directly across from the Caesar's hotel. Unit 1012 is at the end of the hallway on the first floor.

Public Remarks: NO rental restrictions - short-term rental approved! All utilities including electric, water, air conditioning, heat and basic cable are included in the HOA Fee. Fully remodeled, turnkey condo in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale is the perfect opportunity for a vacation home, investment property, or primary residence. Wood plank tile floors throughout make the open concept, single level floor plan light and bright. Quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and soft-closing cabinetry open to the living area, two PRIMARY bedrooms and large enclosed private patio with motorized roller shades. Conveniently located in the complex, this ground level unit provides easy access to the resort-style amenities including heated pool and spa, BBQ ramada, putting green, and fitness center.
Directions: South on Miller Rd to first parking lot on East side of Miller Rd (Phase 1). Unit is in Building 4 Ground Level.

Public Remarks: Prepare to be wowed by this beautifully remodeled 2BR/2BR ground-floor condo located in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale?one of the Valley's most sought-after locations for dining, shopping, spring training, museums, and vibrant nightlife. This home has been renovated from top to bottom with designer finishes and modern touches throughout. Step into the jaw-dropping custom kitchen, featuring a dramatically extended island with ample seating, storage underneath, and a stylish cabinet pantry. The gorgeous two-tone quartz counter tops, sleek stainless-steel appliances, and high-end stonework finishes make this kitchen an entertainer's dream. The open split floor plan features wood-look tile throughout, creating a cohesive and elegant feel. The primary suite includes a remodeled spa-like.....
Directions: From Scottsdale Rd. go East on Chaparral Rd. to 7430. Enter Winfield Place community at 7430 or at the center driveway by the clubhouse. Unit #115A. Building #2.
