Public Remarks: Experience the perfect blend of style and convenience in this fully furnished 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom mid-century-inspired condominium in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale. Located in a quiet community just steps from world-class dining, shopping, and entertainment, this thoughtfully designed home offers a bright and airy living space with timeless mid-century touches. Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living with easy access to the canal, ideal for walking and biking. With a prime location offering quick access to Sky Harbor Airport, Downtown Phoenix, the Biltmore, Arcadia, and North Scottsdale, this home is perfect for a primary residence, vacation retreat, or investment property. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to own a stylish and move-in-ready condo in the heart of Scottsdale.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautiful CORNER condo located  AT SCOTTSDALE MARQUESSA! PRIME LOCATION SUPER CLOSE TO OLD TOWN, FASHION SQUARE, WATERFRONT & BASEBALL SPRING TRAINING!.The unit features a large wrap around balcony with views and another private balcony area. The 2 bedroom, 2 bath features a  newly renovated  Kitchen with white shaker cabinets and quartz countertops. The primary suite has a walk-in closet, updated ensuite bathroom w/ marble countertop & tiled shower. Freshly painted throughout, new AC in 2022. Storage closet & Laundry w/washer & dryer. This secure building with a full time concierge, maintenance personnel, gated parking with EV charging stations. Marquessa  offers its residents a heated pool, rec room, and workout room.The HOA fee covers water/sewer/trash and cable.
Directions: South on Miller to Heritage Scottsdale on West side of Road - 4200 N Miller. There are 3 visitor spots right next to the main entrance.

Public Remarks: This unit at Optima Camelview has been nicely renovated with new floors and updated bathroom fixtures and a large primary bedroom closet.  This unit also has a split floor plan and a very spacious patio facing north. The patio is nice and quiet and shaded most of the day.  The unit is 2 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms and just over 1300 square feet.  It is in the newest building of the Optima Camelview Condos. Once you leave the condo you will see just how much it has to offer just steps away. The unit's proximity to shopping, dining, and nightlife enhances its appeal, along with Camelview's exceptional amenities such as outdoor pools, a fitness center, lap pool, putting green and sports courts. It even has on onsite restaurant & bar if you don't feel like getting to far away from home.
Directions: North on Scottsdale Road, head west on Rancho Vista Drive, left in to the parking garage, turn right for visitor (look for guest parking signs).  Unit is building 7117 located in the Southwest corner

Public Remarks: Step into the heart of Old Town Scottsdale with this stunning luxury 2,300 sf Scottsdale Waterfront High-End Condo. Perched on the 7th floor, it offers breathtaking views that will make every sunrise & sunset feel special. A must-see and truly an incredible and rare find.  Recently remodeled, this stylish space invites you to unwind on its expansive 1,400 sf balcony. Imagine sipping your morning coffee while soaking in the vibrant energy of the city below. Enjoy the convenience of nearby shopping and exceptional dining. Whether you're seeking an investment or a new home, this condo blends comfort, elegance, security and location. It's the perfect lock-and-leave lifestyle waiting for you. Don't miss out on making it yours!
Directions: West on Camelback Road, South on Marshall Way to the Four way stop, Left or East to Scottsdale Waterfront Valet and 7175 Bldg. Entrance.

Public Remarks: Experience luxury living in this beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 2-bath corner unit with no one on either side of you! Located in the highly sought-after Marquessa condominiums in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale. This spacious home overlooks the resort-style heated pool and impeccably maintained green space, offering both comfort and stunning views. The remodeled kitchen features elegant cabinetry, granite countertops, a stylish farmhouse sink, and stainless steel appliances perfect for both everyday living and entertaining. Both bathrooms have been tastefully updated, with the primary suite showcasing dual sinks and modern cabinetry. Additional upgrades include newer windows & HVAC system, engineered hardwood flooring, crown molding throughout, plantation shutters, and a separate laundry
Directions: From Indian School head North on Miller Road. The property is on your left. Look for the Marquessa sign. Guest Parking in front of the main entrance.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 112 CASA DEL MONTE PHASE 3 AMD MCR 019205
Public Remarks: Affordable luxury in Scottsdale's most prestigious location.  Adjacent to the Phoenician Resort and Camelback Mountain's Cholla Trail, this 2 bed, 2 bath lock and leave is the perfect year round retreat or Snowbird escape. This charming home has been remodeled and features polished concrete floors, Ikea cabinetry, timeless white and chrome bathrooms, and a totally open concept.  One of the largest lots in the community, the large covered patio was designed for entertaining, while the mature trees provide shade to the large grassy backyard, With views of Camelback Mountain, this single story condo has it all! Casa del Monte offers resort-style amenities including multiple pools, spa, tennis courts, shuffleboard, clubhouse, fitness center, and BBQ.  A 24 hour guard gate too.
Directions: North on 66th Street; guard gate on east side of street.

Public Remarks: Check out this lovely 2-bedroom  2 bath Condo the fantastic location of Camelback House. You'll be close to restaurants, old town Scottsdale, fashion Square Mall and all of the attractions Scottsdale has to offer! Discover the charming interior, showcasing new carpet with tile in all the right places and neutral colors throughout. Enjoy the balcony overlooking a courtyard where you can sip your morning brew. The galley-style kitchen boasts ample cabinetry, easy care counters, tile backsplash, and built-in appliances. The primary bedroom includes private bathroom with lots of storage  The community features , BBQ's, pools, shuffleboard & clubhouses w/kitchens to host parties & meetings along w/lush landscaping and inviting courtyards . Where else can you live in Scottsdale for under 250k!
Directions: From AZ-143, head east to McDowell Rd, turn left onto N 64th St, turn right onto E Indian School Rd, turn left onto N 68th St, turn left. Property will be on the right.
